none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 18, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Only four songs here, probably as a (then) advance for PRESIDENT FETCH's 1987 cassette debut. Ripping European hardcore that somehow owes equally to HEIBEL and Fresh Fruit-era DKs, this band flies well under the radar, and the first recordings capture them while they were still raw. The first LP is great, and I love the Mould tinge on the guitars on the later recordings, but the piercing chorus on "Bestial" here is a thing of pure beauty. PRESIDENT FETCHedit: These tracks were used on the Pass The Elixer compilation, which was recently shared by (and fucking co-curated by) the folks at the excellent Freedom Has No Bounds blog. 
http://freedomhasnobounds.com/2020/06/26/pass-the-elixer-compilation/

seo.title: President Fetch - Demo - Terminal Escape
